name: TOWN & COUNTRY FINE FURNITURE, Appellant, v. WORKMEN'S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (CHARLES K. JERRECHIAN & SONS and Patricia S. Cooley)
name_abbreviation: Town & Country Fine Furniture v. Workmen's Compensation Appeal Board
docket_number: Appeals Nos. 52 and 98 E.D. Appeal Dkt. 1989

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
parties: TOWN & COUNTRY FINE FURNITURE, Appellant, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (CHARLES K. JERRECHIAN & SONS and Patricia S. Cooley)

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Orders reversed, and matter remanded to Workmen’s Compensation Appeal Board for further action.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Charles W. Craven, David S. Florig, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Christopher H. Wright, Berwyn, for Patricia Cooley at Nos. 52 & 98.
Susan McLaughlin, John E. Smith, Ernest J. Bernabei, Philadelphia, for Charles Jerrechian & Sons at Nos. 52 & 98.
Norman R. Haigh, Secretary, for Dept, of Labor & Industry at Nos. 52 & 98.
casebody.head_matter:
567 A.2d 1042
TOWN & COUNTRY FINE FURNITURE, Appellant, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (CHARLES K. JERRECHIAN & SONS and Patricia S. Cooley)
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 14, 1989.
Decided Jan. 5, 1990.
Charles W. Craven, David S. Florig, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Christopher H. Wright, Berwyn, for Patricia Cooley at Nos. 52 & 98.
Susan McLaughlin, John E. Smith, Ernest J. Bernabei, Philadelphia, for Charles Jerrechian & Sons at Nos. 52 & 98.
Norman R. Haigh, Secretary, for Dept, of Labor & Industry at Nos. 52 & 98.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
